title: Clinical Research Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore)
Interview Descriptions: Met with 2 of the Hiring Managers Asked basic questions like why I applied, how my experience helps Also explained in detail about the job, and answered my questions However, they appeared distracted/tired, and one interviewer was using her phone occasionally during the interview.
Interview Questions: Why do you want this role?

title: Clinical Research Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Smooth interview process. Called up for interview via email and phone call, interviewed by staffs from the department. A good mix of personality and technical questions asked. Pleasant interview experience overall
Interview Questions: What are your future career plans?

title: Senior Clinical Pharmacist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Interview by department senior who was subsequently promoted to a higher position Casual set up at the department meeting room Very factual questions to get to know me Was not as stressful as the other hospitals’
Interview Questions: What do you see yourself doing in 5 years?

title: Executive Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Very insightful time with the bosses, and we had a great discussion. The interview lasted around 40 minutes, with good two-way communication. The interview made me more interested in the job, which was why I accepted the offer.
Interview Questions: What made you interested in this job?

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH in Feb 2023
Interview Descriptions: Interview with the HR and Hiring Manager, followed by a second interview. Second interview was definitely more job-related and they seek to understand your knowledge and how you can contribute to the team
Interview Questions: What my career interests are, what I see myself doing on a day to day basis

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Done via Zoom during pandemic. Was interviewed for a role which requires IT or IT security knowledge and was interviewed by non-IT HODs and an iHiS personnel. Back and forth questions and answer, asking if you have any knowledge of medical devices or infrastructure systems which supports hospital operations
Interview Questions: Questions were really general regarding your IT security experience and what you were doing in your current and previous companies. Whether you have knowledge of cybersecurity for medical devices or infrastructure systems

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Structured, smooth process with standard questions. There was a panel of 3-4 interviewers. Good to know about the healthcare sector, and to share your insights and opinions about healthcare ops, processes, etc.
Interview Questions: What is one area that you think can be improved on in the healthcare sector?

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at TTSH in Jul 2022
Interview Descriptions: Was smooth and interviewer enquired a lot on current job that I am in - however, they were not flexi on start date and thus I did not make it to the second round of interview.
Interview Questions: What do you not like about your current job?

title: Lab Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore)
Interview Descriptions:
Slow procedure for the processing. I only receive the offer email after two weeks from my interview. 
And the hr can only verbally tell you what they offer and terms and conditions without giving you a proper letter or email
Interview Questions: Why did you leave your last job?

title: Medical Social Worker (MSW) Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: first portion includes a case study with several questions testing your assessment skills, intervention planning, and values/ethics, with about 30 minutes to answer all the question. second portion is a panel interview with the principal MSWs and HR
Interview Questions: Why did you choose social work, why medical social work, strengths and weaknesses, impression of MSW's work,  what are my attitudes towards death, questions about how i managed cases during my internship experiences

title: Patient Service Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in May 2022
Interview Descriptions: Tour of the facility, How to get to the clinic frm MRT. Explaining a-bit of what you would be doing. Where u are stationed at etc. before gg to interview.
Interview Questions:
Ofc a brief intro of yourself and experience you have.
Whatever experience you have that would make you suitable for this role. What you know and expect of that role. (W/o any judgments from them) so you don’t have to be pressured when answering. Know your character and how u are as a person.

title: Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: It is trying to get to know you and calm interview. Interviewers were quite professional with the  questions asked for the role  being interviewed for. Overall it's a very calming interview
Interview Questions: Why do you want join us

title: Social Work Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Apr 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interviewers (especially the man) were mocking me by asking stupid questions that don't make sense. When I got scared and stuttered, they would giggle while on webcam because they think that I look stupid while answering their nonsense questions
Interview Questions: If you were to get infected by this deadly virus in the future while working here, and you have only few months left to live, who would you break the news to first?

title: Management Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Friendly interviewers, asked many good questions (about 12 of them) and guided me in answering them. There are many types of questions catering to the generic ones, soft skills and also technical aspects.
Interview Questions: What did you learn from your previous internship?

title: Radiography Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH (Novena, ) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: interview process was relatively quick and simple, not troublesome at all!! interviewers were very nice and does not make me feel nervous answering questions. they do take their time to answer your questions if you have any and are more than willing to explain more about your job scope if there’s anything you are unclesr about
Interview Questions: why did i want to join ttsh

title: PSA Patient Service Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore)
Interview Descriptions:
Selected candidate will be invited for zoom interview.
Interview successful will be notified by call & mail.
Follow by pre medical check up.
No medical issue will be notified to start work.
Whole process take about 2-3 week's.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself, your past experience.

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at TTSH in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions:
Did a written business proposal on provided computer.
Waited 1 hour+ to meet with the HR & Director, to which one of them was very disrespectful to my current work. It was really informal as they didn't ask me other experience/job related questions.
Interview Questions: Have you applied with others.

title: Radiographer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Quite ok and not too complicated and not very hard also. Just typical interview questions and seeing how you answer them. So just need to keep cool and calm. Try to relate to the hospital also
Interview Questions: Why you choose this job?

title: Administrative Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Open & inclusive. Felt comfortable. The boss imvited another colleague to sit in. It felt more like a chat. After the interview I remember filling in an assessment form to assess the suitability of job fit
Interview Questions: Cannot quite remember the questions.

title: Executive Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Fuss free process - interviewers were kind and thorough in questioning, overall I felt comfortable and assured. They were transparent in what the job entails and their vision for the department, which was what attracted me to the job
Interview Questions: My goals in 5 years

title: Executive Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: Zoom interview last year. 3 interviewers, some of them were late to the interview.. over was smooth but I think they want you to understand the department and job scope first before the interview. there was not a lot of information online to research for the role.
Interview Questions: What is your strength and weaknesses?

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Jun 2021
Interview Descriptions:
It was a zoom interview that lasted around 30 mins.
With 3 people interviewing me but the interview started 5 mins late to wait for all the people to enter the zoom.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself? Why did you choose to apply? What are your strengths and weaknesses?

title: Management Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions:
- Online application which included 2 short essays
- Assessment Centre (2 parts)
- Panel Interview

Not difficult since they do give you a list of readings before the AC, panel interview was mostly fit and included some CA questions. Interviewers were really nice and made the whole process rather fun.
Interview Questions: Fit, behavioural and CA questions

title: Assistant Finance Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions:
Hiring manager began interview with asking what i wanted to achieve in my career, in doing so her aim was to find out whether this job proffers the opportunity for that. In so Hiring manager ensued a debate on what my goal entails in a rather challenging fashion, can't say her demeanor was pleasant. Found out that the job description being advertised for does not fit what Hiring Manager was looking for at all i.e. FP&A being advertised, IA was the main scope.

HR personnel was professional and pleasant though.
Interview Questions:
- What are you trying to achieve in your career
- Name a work challenge which you overcome, and how  you managed it.

title: Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: It is very professional and also gives you a more detailed information on the job and some technical question. Interview is quick and straight to the point of the roles that was being applied
Interview Questions: Why do i want to join

title: Healthcare ManagementProgram Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Group case study that was on zoom since it’s still COVID-19 period. The session was quite long so be prepared for it. But you will get a break in between.
Interview Questions: The questions are based on what your answers in the case study.

title: Senior Executive Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: HR and interviewer were both rude. Both were just busy going through the documents and did not cue when to start and expect interviewee to start talking. Asked irrelevant questions like "Is so and so still working there?", "What modules did you study in school?" when candidate has 10 years of working experience. Candidate express interest to learn about the field but interviewer replied "I dont know whats there to learn, I need the person to do the job. We can offer a contract role to try you out and since you are in need of a job". Got an offer eventually but did not accept immediately. HR replied "Don't wait for other company to offer, you need to follow up. I can't give you too many days to think about"
Interview Questions: Tell me your strength and weakness

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH (Woodlands New Town, ) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: Was contacted via phone to arrange for an interview with the HR team. Standard interview process with assignment which you must complete between the permitted timeframe prior and during interview. The assingment consisted of transcribing minutes from a meeting within 20 mins
Interview Questions: Standard questions asked during the interview such as why am i joining healthcare, career aspirations. Nothing too challenging

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore)
Interview Descriptions:
Applied and was contacted by HR within a few days. The interview went smoothly despite the lack of professionalism from the HR. The HR is one of the worst I had ever encountered. 
 She have no clue about the job role, unable to provide any info about the role. Lack of professionalism, did not even try to check with her colleagues and get back. Just a straight 'dont know' to every questions I have about the role.
This really reflect badly on the hospital.
If there is an advice I can give to the management team, it will be to relook into your HR. Hire people who are willing to put in effort to be a good hr not some random people who is just trying to pass time.
Interview Questions: tell me more about yourself

title: Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: quick interview process, friendly HR. Need to do a test followed by interview. Interviewed by a total of 5 staff. More vacation leaves than other agencies. Seems like a caring environment.
Interview Questions: share more abt ur experience

title: Management Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions:
2 rounds of interviews 
First round was 1:1, followed by a group interview with management
Assessments in between each interview which required technical knowledge 
Included case study tests and personal reflections
Interview Questions: How would people around you describe you?

title: Senior Research Fellow Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: The PI was knowledgeable and friendly. Depending on the job, they will give you a test to ensure that you did not lie in your resume. The HR was also present and mainly took down notes.
Interview Questions:
What are your weakness?
Why did you apply for this job?
What do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Administration Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: average interview question, question asked by interviewee were generally answered. Very short interview. Very average interview questions. Hiring process was very simple as well. But don’t go to agency as they just anyhow Place u in a position they require for themselves.
Interview Questions: Tell me more about urself

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions:
HR was fast and efficient. They were also quite friendly. The scientist who was hiring asked very straightforward questions and didn't fluff anything. I liked that alot. He was also very direct about what he wanted and what he expected from the RA. 

However, the job description posted online was very vague, so I wasn't sure what exactly I was applying for (besides the title)
Interview Questions: What do you want to do in the future? 5 year plans

title: Executive Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Novena, ) in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions: HR took around 3 weeks to contact me for interview and received the job offer after almost 2 weeks. Interview was conducted via zoom with 3 interviewers, all of them were very friendly and wanting to know more about me and willing to share info as much as possible. Not much pressure during the interview.
Interview Questions: Can you introduce your self?

title: Management Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions: Interview was nerve-wrecking as it was my first time applying for an internship! Read up a lot on the hospital's mission and values as well as the job roles of interest (they gave 30 roles and will ask you to indicate your top three preferred choices)
Interview Questions:
What is one thing you think can be improved in healthcare in Singapore?
Tell me one setback from your previous employment and how you managed to overcome it
How did you become interested in healthcare

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Use Zoom interview and then there was more than one interviewer.  All interviewer was very kind and nothing really formal so not as stressful.  No lag in the Zoom interview.
Interview Questions: Availability and the kind of experience.

title: Graduate Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at TTSH in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: Prompt call up for interview following an email application. The job didn’t describe the requirements properly. But it was an honest chat and I think it was good that the interviewer was upfront about it.
Interview Questions: Standard stuff like 5 and 10 year plans, if I can work weekends

title: OT Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Clementi New Town, ) in May 2020
Interview Descriptions: relatively halfway processing from HR’s end.. interview panel was also very nice and friendly. They are genuinely just asking for your interest and passions ... all the best to all who’s applying!
Interview Questions: Why occupational therapy, what are your passions?

title: Coder Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore)
Interview Descriptions: Interviewers were open in expressing that they were late for the interview due to their workload issues. Their focus was more on  checking whether the candidate will have any commitments in the near future which to them, may prove detrimental to their daily functions as it will cause manpower shortage such as candidate having kids and thus requiring to go on maternity leave and any medical conditions.
Interview Questions: Are you intending to have children in the near  future

title: Allied Health Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH in Feb 2020
Interview Descriptions: Relatively fast, standard questions asked by human resource . Be prepared to answer questions about job role. Do own research of job position. Be confident and firm, u can do it.
Interview Questions: Tell me more abt yourself

title: Operations Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Fast and simple, ask about your job experience and a bit of fit question. Nothing major. 2 rounds, one with the team and one with the management. Mostly relating to work experience in hospitality
Interview Questions: 1. Tell me more about yourself

title: Senior Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Quick and efficient. It only takes a few weeks from applying online to setting an interview date to finalisation and confirmation and signing of contract. This process largely depends on which department is processing your application.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself

title: Anonymous Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Interviewers were pretty rude and not very accommodating , was a very bad experience and wouldn’t recommend anyone working there. It was the volunteer and community engagement department, they asked a question and based on an interview assumed that candidate is unable to handle difficult situations.
Interview Questions: How do you handle difficult situations

title: Respiratory Therapist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: To answer the questions basis on the work experience. There are 5-6 questions not really difficult. Need to do the paper exam before interview. To answer the questions basis on the work experience. There are 5-6 questions not really difficult. Need to do the paper exam before interview.
Interview Questions: Clinic trouble shooting.

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore)
Interview Descriptions: There is a written assessment follow by 2 rounds of face to face interviews. 1 round with HR and hiring manager follow by another round with head of department.
Interview Questions:
1. Shared on past work experience 
2. Why do you want to join the healthcare industry

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at TTSH in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions:
Was scheduled an interview pretty quickly and offered the position within the next 3 weeks.
HR was quick to process all the relevant documents and was kind enough to inform me that I have to join by a particular date to be eligible for the bonus payout
Interview Questions: What did I know about the job that I am applying for.

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions:
Good, pleasant interviewers. There are two rounds of interview and the average time for the interviews is about 1.5 hours. 

Does not feel like an interview, but rather a conversation between the hiring managers and me.
Interview Questions:
What's your career goals?
Where do you see yourselves in 5 years time.

title: Medical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Waited for awhile before interview started, called in by interviewer. 4 interviewers was in the room, with the lab manager and 2 ladies probably from HR. Took about 15-20minutes probably, few questions asked.
Interview Questions: Basic questions- tell me about yourself, why did i not continue at my old job

title: Management Associate Programmer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions:
Part 1: Case Study Presentation 
- a group of 5 people given 45 mins to prepare a 15 mins presentation

Part 2: Activities
- there will be activities where your team members must work together for. You will be assessed on your leadership and teamwork
Interview Questions: Questions about local healthcare industry

title: Management Associate Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions:
Group Case Study in the first half followed by  a game-based activity in the second half. 
Case study has limited time and the information given is more than required. Q&A follows the presentation
Interview Questions: Based on the case study and your presentation, they will ask a question regarding the overall situation that you proposed

title: Management Trainee Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: Selected applicants after the assessment centre were invited for interviews. I was an individual interview. Most interviews took place in the late afternoon/evening. Mine lasted approx. 30 mins as scheduled.
Interview Questions: Why healthcare (and not an industry you studied in)?

title: Management Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: I was called down for interview and it was a panel of 4 to 5 interviewers. They got back to me after 2 weeks from the interview date. They called me to tell me about the offer.
Interview Questions: Are you passionate in Healthcare?

title: People Development Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: Stressful interview. Keep throwing questions. Interviewer look stern. Seems like unhappy when mentioned that i have a child. Unpleasant experience with them. Emailed to check for status of interview but no reply from them.
Interview Questions: Why do you think we should hire you

title: Management Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: 3 people made up the interviewer panel in a meeting room. The interview process lasted for about 25-30 minutes. Generally, the questions asked were basically elaboration of what was written in your resume.
Interview Questions: What do you think about the current healthcare situation in Singapore?

title: Medical Affairs Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: After submitting the qualifications, you are given an hour to complete an assessment. The assessment consists of 5 questions which are written version of a meeting discussion and you have to write minutes accordingly. However, it hard to know what requirements they are expecting- Point form or?
Interview Questions: Why do you think you are suitable for this job?

title: Medical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at TTSH in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: told that interview will be at 300pm and I should come in 15 minutes but in the end only at 420pm, the interview started. Nonetheless, the interview process was a relatively quick one, interviewers are nice.
Interview Questions: why do you want to work in the healthcare sector?

title: Management Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: I was called up to be informed that I was chosen for an interview. I was only given one day in advance notice for this interview so I felt quite unprepared and rush. I could not research and prepare much.
Interview Questions: Describe one challenge you have faced and how you overcome it?

title: Executive Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: Was quite pleasant, interviewers were nice and friendly. They really were out to get to know you. Ask questions based on past experiences in school if your a fresh grad.
Interview Questions: How can your experience contribute to the company?

title: MAP Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: There is an assessment round before this and the final panel interview. Final interview was with 5 different management level and it was basically asking questions in relation to your resume and how you see this program benefitting you.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years time?

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Toa Payoh New Town, ) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: Everyone was friendly and helpful. Standard questions were asked during the interview process, but it was briefed. Interview took place on 21/09/17. Still awaiting for reply. However, I realised that they edited the job application notice offer on 22/09/17, seeking for a higher qualification. I guess I didn't get the job.
Interview Questions: Which job that you've acquired in the past left most impression on you?

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions:
I applied online and received a call from HR 2-3 weeks later for an interview.

There was only one interview with the reporting officer and the manager of the unit.

Many questions were asked about my current job and ensuring that the motivation for the job switch was strongly justified. 

The interviewers also explained the job scope and also questioned if I would be comfortable with the relatively linguistic nature of the job.
Interview Questions: Why don't you request for an internal transfer?

title: Senior Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Aug 2017
Interview Descriptions: I applied directly on their job portal. The interview process was quick. I received an interview in two weeks and confirmation in a week, followed by health check. Whole process took about a month.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths and weaknesses?

title: Management Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore)
Interview Descriptions:
I went for the group assessment after submitting my resume through jobstreet. The first part of the assessment was an individual assignment. Each person was given some time and materials to present on the topic. There were 2 assessors whom we presented to. 

After the individual assessment, we were asked to discuss our ideas as a group and come up with a group answers. After this group presentation, we were asked questions by the interviewers. 

The last section was a team game. To prepare for the assessment, I think it would be good to understand about the industry/local healthcare scene.
Interview Questions: Not many questions were asked apart from the q&a from the group work.

title: Management Trainee Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Assessment Centre was a half day thing whereby there was two case studies (1 individual, 1 group) and a group problem-solving activity. Time is limited with evaluators constantly assessing your response and actions.
Interview Questions: Propose a solution according to the strategy you have chosen from the case.

title: Management Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: Went for the assessment centre which consisted of an individual case study where you are given 20minutes to read quite a few articles and answer the question, a group case study, and a group task which was done in a game style. Total time for the assessment was around 4 hours.
Interview Questions: Out of 5 points given in the case study, which has the most impact on the healthcare industry?

title: Management Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at TTSH (Novena, ) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions:
First part: Case Study Presentation (to senior management)
-given about 20min to speed read through a 20++ page long article about strategies to improve healthcare
-followed by 5min individual presentation
-followed by 20min group discussion
-followed by 20min group presentation
-then q&a
-panel will ask critical questions regarding your group's presentation
-questions will be tough but panel is generally respectful of candidates (they pay attention to what you say and don't overly badger you with criticism)

Second part: Puzzle/Game
-senior management attached to your team will be observing you to assess you teamwork and leadership
-this was honestly quite a fun experience

Overall quite a well managed procedure.  The case study presentations will require brainwork. You will be mentally exhausted after it. So be prepared for it.  As for the second part, just have fun with it!
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Physiotherapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at TTSH (Novena, ) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: it comes with a general questions and answers about you component followed by a clinical competency component. more weight seems to be paid to the ability to answer clinical questions and the confidence during the interview.
Interview Questions: why did you choose to be a physiotherapist?

title: Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: Relax and chill. they did not ask much questions but just about how much you willing to give to the society. haha. it is really easy process of getting hired
Interview Questions: tell me about yourself and 5 years time

title: Management Associate Programmer Interview
Application Type: The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH in Mar 2016
Interview Descriptions: Panel Interview with the management, human resource manager. Before interview had a personality quiz that needs to be filled up. A few questions on why you want to apply and about some experience you had previously
Interview Questions: Tell me more about yourself

title: Management Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Mar 2016
Interview Descriptions:
I was invited for the assessment centre. The assessment centre includes a few stages such as writing assessment, group discussion, group project.
Group discussion on a case and then present them.
Group project is more of a fun assignment competing against other groups.
Interview Questions: What is the biggest challenge you have faced?

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: Was called for interview within 10 days of job application. Went to TTSH for interview and had received call from HR within 2 weeks for job offer. The overall experience was positive.
Interview Questions: How do you think you can contribute to TTSH, in terms of your experience?

title: Temp PSA Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions:
Contract role offered by Recruit Express whilst I submitted an application there for an admin position. Was under the impression that the job was an office based/sit down one, but I guess that is only for permanent hires. Had to be on my feet running about the whole day. This isn't by any fault of TTSH, more of RE trying to clear roles.

On TTSH's side, they just did the regular health screening questionnaires etc.
Interview Questions: - Are you alright with working at a hospital? At this location? Etc.

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview with 3 from the dept and 1 hr. A wide range of questions were asked but it seemed like they focused on past activities in my uni days instead of my past work experience.
Interview Questions: Why do you think you are suitable for the post.

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions:
come prepared with background information of the hospital and the job scope.Dress formally and think before you speak. 
Be keen to ask questions
dont try to smoke the interviewers, be genuine
Interview Questions:
questions about why you choose this job
come prepared with background information of the hospital and the job scope.Dress formally and think before you speak. 
Be keen to ask questions

title: Medical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed by both HR and lab manager. I was asked to fill up a questionnaire by HR and interviewed by lab manager on the same day. Mainly they are interested to find out more about me.
Interview Questions: Were asked to answer a set of questionnaire to match the personality for that applied job position.

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at TTSH
Interview Descriptions: There was only one round of interview with the HR as well as the department heads. Very normal questions like "why do you want to join the healthcare sector" and "why do you like this job" were asked. Atmosphere was pleasant and comfortable.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to join the healthcare sector

title: Med Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Dec 2013
Interview Descriptions: Interview was simple and short. It was quite an easy one. Just the hr hiring manager and the manager of the department. Whole interview took about 30 minutes. Questions were rather typical interview questions you can find online.
Interview Questions: How well is your knowledge about lab practices, do you know about jci?

title: Allied Health Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Jul 2013
Interview Descriptions: asked relevant questions. approachable employer and human resource personnel. interested in finding out more about you. efficient human resource team. not too serious or intimidating. open to answering questions posed during interview. open to sharing about job scope or prospects.
Interview Questions: Why are you passionate about this job

title: Management Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Apr 2013
Interview Descriptions:
1st Round - Task-based Assessment, Case Study, Debate
Last Round - Panel Interview
Interview Questions: Motivation to join Healthcare industry

title: Patient Service Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions:
Interview with HR staff & the executive of future workplace. 
Overall OK. 
Experience, education check. future plan, starting date. Told about the work details: joib scope, salary, benefit & etc.
Interview Questions: Future plan.

title: MA Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at TTSH (Singapore) in Jun 2011
Interview Descriptions: We were called up for interview to tan tock seng hospital. Generally, the interview is based on group activities that must be completed. The activities were well designed and quite fun. During this time, we were evaluated based on the performance as well as team work. Refreshments were also provided for us after the interview.
Interview Questions: Group interview

title: Visitor Management Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at TTSH (Novena, ) in Mar 2010
Interview Descriptions: No interviews from company's management, only had one from hiring company, and there was not much question asked.
Interview Questions: None.

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at TTSH in Nov 2009
Interview Descriptions: Direct interview was carried out with clinicans supervisor, with informal setting. Smooth and was looking for candidates with independent skills and passions for infectious disease
Interview Questions: Technical questions regarding laboratories procedures
